page.title: 20Birchover Village Fair
page.content:
A Village Fair is held each Summer but in June 1984 it was combined with the School Centenary. The Playgroup, Church, Chapels and W.I set up stalls in the school play- ground and sold handicrafts, plants, cakes and jumble whilst refreshments were available in the Reading Room. In Church was a Flower Festival with the organist playing appropriate music Meanwhile the Centenary Exhibition in school provided great interest as past pupils reminisced over old photographs The school kitchen, too, was trans- formed into a Victorian kitchen with local people lending furnishings and equipment. Maypole dancing by the children added a final delightful touch to the event.
Written by pupils, staff and friends of Birchover Infants School.
